text: Nikenike Vurobaravu (born 3 December 1951Profile of Nikenike Vurobaravuhttps://rulers.org/indexv.html) is a Ni-Vanuatu diplomat and politician. He has been the President of Vanuatu since 23 July 2022. He is a member of the Vanua'aku Pati (VP) political party. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Vanuatu Category:Current national leaders
title: Nikenike Vurobaravu
